bibl.title: and Francesca ANGIÒ (Guest Editors), New Epigrams Attributed to Posidippus of Pella = Classics@. Issue 1.
bibl.note: Introduction (by David PETRAIN). - Text of the Posidippus Epigrams. - Translations. - Bibliography [updated as of January, 2010]. - Posidippus Conference: "On Reading a New Epigram Collection" [Harvard Center for Hellenic Studies, April 19-20, 2002]. - Further Resources.

NAGY Gregory and James O'DONNELL (Editors), Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU, Martine CUYPERS, and Francesca ANGIÒ (Guest Editors), New Epigrams Attributed to Posidippus of Pella = Classics@. Issue 1.
Washington, D.C., Center for Hellenic Studies, 2002, s.p. [Uniquement accessible en téléchargement gratuit: < http://chs.harvard.edu/wa/pageR?tn=ArticleWrapper&bdc=12&mn=1341 >.]
Nagy O'Donnell Acosta-Hughes Kosmetatou Cuypers Angiò Petrain
